EmailTemplate.textOnly: In 2021, grocery eCommerce sales topped $100B—just in the U.S. alone. Let that figure sink in. Don't entrust your customer's shopping experience to anyone else. NCR Freshop enables flexible online experiences while maximizing operational efficiencies, increasing ROI and engagement.
